panels.description: Currently can't get some status vars as all wsrep variables are (sometimes incorrectly) taken to be integers. See https://github.com/influxdata/telegraf/issues/1896
Currently can't get some status vars as all wsrep variables are (sometimes incorrectly) taken to be integers. See https://github.com/influxdata/telegraf/issues/1896

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("wsrep_flow_control_sent"), 1s) FROM "mysql" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s)

list.label: Host
list.name: Host
list.query: show tag values on "db_metrics" from "mysql" with key = "host"
